string  _version,
string  _website,
string  _email,
bool  _common_log_format = true 
)

The default constructor.

Creates a new bug report object.

Parameters:
_name Application name.
_version Application version.
_website Application website.
_email Email to send bug reports to.
_common_log_format If true, a log format similar to the Apache Common Log Format will be used.

Member Function Documentation

void CoreDebugLog::Print ( CoreDebugLog::BugReportPriority  _lowest_priority = BUG_LEVEL_WARNING  ) 

Print the bug report.

Prints the bug report to stdout along with colours.

Parameters:
_lowest_priority The lowest priority of bug information that will be printed.

void CoreDebugLog::Save (  ) 

Save the bug report.

Saves the bug report to a file named "year-month-day_application_version.log".
